com.compendium.core.db.management
Class DBEmptyDatabase

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.management.DBEmptyDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBConstants, DBConstantsDerby, DBConstantsMySQL, java.io.Serializable
public class DBEmptyDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBConstants, DBConstantsMySQL, DBConstantsDerby

This class creates a new Empty Database.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

DBEmptyDatabase

public DBEmptyDatabase(int nDatabaseType,
                       DBAdminDatabase admin,
                       java.lang.String sDatabaseName,
                       java.lang.String sDatabasePassword,
                       java.lang.String sDatabaseIP)
This constructor also takes a name and password to use when accessing the database, and the IP address of the server machine.

Parameters:
nDatabaseType, - the type of database application being used.
DBAdminDatabase - admin, a reference to the administration database so that the new database can be registered.
sDatabaseName, - the name to use when creating the connection to the database
sDatabasePassword, - the password to use when connection to the database.
sDatabaseIP, - the IP address of the MySQL server machine. The default if 'localhost'.
